SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class GameInputHandler

java.lang.Object
java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GameInputHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
WindowFocusListener, WindowListener, WindowStateListener, EventListener
public class GameInputHandler extends WindowAdapter
This class acts as the handler for all the user inputs that either modify the gui or are sent to the server.

    • GameInputHandler

      public GameInputHandler(CommandPassthrough serverProxy, GameGUI gui, ViewController controller)
      Constructs the game input handler.
      Parameters:
      serverProxy - enter point of the network connection
      gui - gui on which this input handler is attached to
      controller - view model controller

      public void sendMsg(String addressee, String message) throws RemoteException
      Sends a message to the selected addressee.
      Parameters:
      addressee - message receiver
      message - message body
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during connection

    • connect

      public void connect(String nickname) throws RemoteException, IllegalStateException
      Attempts to connect the user to the server with the chosen nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - user identifier
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during connection
      IllegalStateException - if the nickname format isn't valid

    • setNumOfPlayers

      public void setNumOfPlayers(int numOfPlayers) throws RemoteException
      Attempts to set the number of players.
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayers - number of players to play the match.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a connection error occurs

    • placeStartCard

      public void placeStartCard(boolean placeOnFront) throws IllegalStateException
      Attempts to place the starting card.
      Parameters:
      placeOnFront - true if the starting card is facing up, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the starting card cannot be placed at the time of the invocation

      Attempts to choose color of the player.
      Parameters:
      colour - chosen color
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a connection error occurs

    • chooseObjective

      public void chooseObjective(ViewObjectiveCard chosenCard) throws RemoteException, IllegalStateException
      Attempts to choose secret objective card.
      Parameters:
      chosenCard - chosen objective card
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a connection error occurs
      IllegalStateException - if no card is selected

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(String cardID, GamePoint placePos, String cornerDir, boolean placeOnFront) throws IllegalStateException
      Attempts to place the selected card.
      Parameters:
      cardID - placing card id
      placePos - position on which the card has to be placed
      cornerDir - corner direction
      placeOnFront - true if the card is facing up, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the card cannot be placed at the time of the invocation

    • draw

      public void draw(char deck, int cardPosition) throws RemoteException, IllegalStateException
      Attempts to draw the card in the selected deck position.
      Parameters:
      deck - deck identifier
      cardPosition - card position in the deck
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a connection error occurs
      IllegalStateException - if the selected position is invalid

    • restartGame

      public void restartGame(int numOfPlayers)
      Attempts to restart the game with the specified number of players.
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayers - number of players of the next game

    • notifyDisconnection

      public void notifyDisconnection()
      Notifies the gui of the local player disconnection. This may be due to a connection error or the turn timer ending.

    • isLocalPlayer

      public boolean isLocalPlayer(String nickname)
      Returns true if the given nickname is associated with the local player, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      nickname - player's id to confront
      Returns:
      true if the given nickname matches the local player's nickname, false otherwise

    • getLocalPlayer

      Returns:
      local player's hand

    • windowClosing

      public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e)
      Attempts to disconnect the player from the lobby and exits the application.
      Specified by:
      windowClosing in interface WindowListener
      Overrides:
      windowClosing in class WindowAdapter
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - may be thrown for different reasons:
      - nickname doesn't match any of the connected players' nicknames
      - a client instance not connected is trying to disconnect
      - game reaches an illegal state of execution.
      IllegalArgumentException - may be thrown for different reasons:
      - nickname doesn't match any of the connected players' nicknames
      - an inner state exception
